definition: (I'll) teach you a lesson/put you in your place
pinyin: gei3 ni3 dian3 yan2 se4 kan4 kan5

sentences.english: The diamond is of the highest color grading for a white diamond and clarity ranking.
sentences.chinese: 这颗钻石具有白钻石最高的颜色评级和净度。

sentences.english: The bright colours on the wall caught our attention.
sentences.chinese: 墙壁上鲜艳的颜色吸引了我们的注意力。

sentences.english: This is the color of hopefulness, and of our connection to nature.
sentences.chinese: 这种颜色代表着希望，以及我们和自然的关联。

sentences.english: Short dangling chains shine with multi-coloured bezel-set crystals.
sentences.chinese: 悬挂着的短饰链配上富多种颜色的包边镶嵌水晶。

sentences.english: Advanced Aeronautics booster color changes for Apollo and Carrier Drones.
sentences.chinese: 先进航空学将会改变阿波罗和舰载机的加速器颜色。

sentences.english: The stability of colour and depth of shade were improved by after-treatment.
sentences.chinese: 通过后处理提高了热转印布样的颜色稳定性和深度。

sentences.english: Meshes with vertex colors, normals and one or two UV sets.
sentences.chinese: 网格模型包含顶点颜色，法线，一到两个uv集。

sentences.english: They counterchanged the floor in the bedroom with several colours.
sentences.chinese: 他们把卧室的地板铺成交错的颜色。

sentences.english: Some laminates are available in plain colors, too.
sentences.chinese: 一些层板可在普通的颜色，太。

sentences.english: The colorful pocket in the front can change the color as customer require.
sentences.chinese: 前面彩色的裁片可根据客户的要求更换颜色。

sentences.english: Instead, by mixing primary colors, all other colors can be generated.
sentences.chinese: 相反，通过混合三原色，可以生成其他所有的颜色。

sentences.english: By using big VOXEL, the color or texture of a volume is rendered.
sentences.chinese: 通过大体素可显示体的颜色与材质等属性。

sentences.english: Light the degree of coloring for object is called color rendering.
sentences.chinese: 光源对于物体颜色呈现的程度称为显色性。

sentences.english: The colors arent fast, so be careful when you wash this shirt.
sentences.chinese: 这些颜色易褪色，所以洗衬衫时要小心。

sentences.english: Complementary colors make white lights when two are mixed.
sentences.chinese: 当两种颜色混合时，互补色合成白光。

sentences.english: A typical example would be colors used for syntax highlighting with an editor.
sentences.chinese: 一个典型示例是用颜色来突出显示编辑器中的语法。
